Class TwoPointLinearEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.link_intersystems.math.PointSlopeLinearEquation
      • com.link_intersystems.math.TwoPointLinearEquation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearEquation

    public class TwoPointLinearEquation
extends PointSlopeLinearEquation
    Two-point based LinearEquation. 
               y2 - y1
 y - y1 = --------- ( x - x1 )
           x2 - x1
    Since:
    1.2.0;
    Author:

        Two-point based TwoPointLinearEquation. 
                   y2 - y1
 y - y1 = --------- ( x - x1 )
           x2 - x1

      • TwoPointLinearEquation

        public TwoPointLinearEquation(double x,
                              double y)
        Two-point based TwoPointLinearEquation. Constructor for a LinearEquation that assumes that the LinearEquation's intercept point with the x axis is (0,0). 
                   y2 - y1
 y - y1 = --------- ( x - x1 )
           x2 - x1
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of point 1.
        y - y coordinate of point 1.
        Since:
